MODELO

	max: Z = 1x1 2x2 
Sujeito a:
	2x1 1x2 1x3 = 10
	1x1 2x2 1x4 = 10
	-1x1 1x5 = -3
	x1 >= 0, x2 >= 0, x3 >= 0, x4 >= 0, x5 >= 0 

QUADRO INICIAL
			X1		X2		X3		X4		X5		
Z 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	2,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	
X3	10,0000000 	2,0000000 	1,0000000 	1,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	
X4	10,0000000 	1,0000000 	2,0000000 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	0,0000000 	
X5	-3,0000000 	-1,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	

PIVOTEAMENTO DO PRIMAL ...
			X1		X2		X3		X4		X5		
Z 	-10,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	-1,0000000 	0,0000000 	
X3	5,0000000 	1,5000000 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	-0,5000000 	0,0000000 	
X2	5,0000000 	0,5000000 	1,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,5000000 	0,0000000 	
X5	-3,0000000 	-1,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	

PIVOTEAMENTO DO DUAL ...
			X1		X2		X3		X4		X5		
Z 	-10,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	-1,0000000 	0,0000000 	
X3	0,5000000 	0,0000000 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	-0,5000000 	1,5000000 	
X2	3,5000000 	0,0000000 	1,0000000 	0,0000000 	0,5000000 	0,5000000 	
X1	3,0000000 	1,0000000 	-0,0000000 	-0,0000000 	-0,0000000 	-1,0000000 	


Solução = 10,0000000 	
Variáveis da base: 
X3 = 0,5000000 
X2 = 3,5000000 
X1 = 3,0000000
